trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_000_000<tab>M-My <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Have you come to inspect the reconstruction? In any case, we're honored for your visit!

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_010_000<tab>Ah, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The chief foreman mentioned that you'd be helping us. It'd be my pleasure to explain the work to you!
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_010_010<tab>First and foremost, in order to carry out the reconstruction, it goes without saying that we require a great deal of supplies.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_010_020<tab>To that end, we ask that our artisans provide us with various supplies.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_010_030<tab>Items you wish to donate can be brought to myself. Feel free to ask me any time about what we seek.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_010_040<tab>Naturally, you'll be rewarded for your contributions. Depending on the item, we'll present you with an amount in skybuilders' scrips.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_010_050<tab>You can take these scrips to Enie yonder, who will exchange them for various wares. If you wish to know more, she would be glad to assist you.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_010_011<tab>Though the reconstruction effort itself is complete, we remain in need of supplies for maintenance and upkeep of the Firmament.

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_010_021<tab>The items you donate will be put to use for building inspection and repair, as well as to provide necessary services to all those who call the district home.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_020_000<tab>Now, has anyone informed you about our unique materials requirements? If not, please allow me.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_020_010<tab>While most of the materials our artisans require are commonplace, some are completely specific to our needs.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_020_020<tab>For such items, we must turn to gatherers for procurement. If you're versed in this field, we would appreciate your assistance!

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_SYSTEM_020_030<tab>Information on the items required may be viewed under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ishgard Restoration<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_030_000<tab>Oh, er... It seems you're still relatively inexperienced in your craft.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_030_010<tab>While it pains me to say this, we require all of our artisans to possess a certain level of skill.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_030_020<tab>I'm afraid there isn't anything we can ask you to bring at this time...
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_SYSTEM_030_030<tab>You must have a Disciple of the Hand class of level 20 or above in order to deliver items to Potkin.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_040_000<tab>Hmmm... Yes, I see that you're amply experienced in your craft.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_040_010<tab>If you'd kindly lend me your log, I'll write down a list of the items we need for your reference.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_040_020<tab>Of course, our needs can change over time. If you wish to know what's currently in demand, don't hesitate to ask me.

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_SYSTEM_040_030<tab>Items requested by Potkin can be crafted by accessing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>crafting log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and selecting the recipe under <var 1A 02 /var>Ishgard Restoration<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_050_000<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var>, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>! How may I assist you?

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_060_000<tab>Concerted works are underway even as we speak, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>. While your participation would be appreciated, if you have items to contribute, I'd of course be happy to take them off your hands.

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_070_000<tab>Thanks to the efforts of our builders, all scheduled works have been completed. In preparation for the next stage, I hope we can continue to depend on contributions from you!
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_070_001<tab>Welcome to the Firmament, friend! Have you perchance brought any materials or items that you might be willing to donate for maintenance and upkeep?

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_000_010<tab>Ah, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I believe the chief foreman has been wanting a word with you.

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_080_000<tab>My <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! With the restoration effort reaching a new phase, we now require additional kinds of materials. As ever, I look forward to receiving your contributions.

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_080_001<tab>My <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thanks to your efforts and those of your fellow artisans, the reconstruction effort is at long last complete! We still, however, require materials for maintenance and upkeep of the district's facilities, and would most appreciate your continued aid.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_090_000<tab>Oh, and I should mention that we've introduced an initiative to provide additional incentive and excitement to collaborators such as your good self.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_090_010<tab>The initiative takes the form of a game of chance called the Kupo of Fortune.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_090_020<tab>Permit me to give you a brief overview.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_090_030<tab>When you donate certain items to us, you will receive a stamp upon a voucher.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_090_040<tab>Once you have collected five stamps, you may take the voucher to Lizbeth for your chance to win a splendid prize.
TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_POTKIN_090_050<tab>If you wish to know more, I recommend you speak with Lizbeth herself.

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>Expert recipes have been added for high-level Ishgardian Restoration crafting items. For more details, please refer to your crafting log and the associated Active Help entry.

TEXT_CTSHWDCRAFTERSUPPLY_00649_SYSTEM_100_010<tab>There are expert recipes for high-level Ishgardian Restoration crafting items. For more details, please refer to your crafting log and the associated Active Help entry.
